This does not affect gameplay.” Platform: Sony PlayStation 4 Rating: T – Teen Release Year: 2016 Genre: Role Playing MPN: 730865020010 Game Name: Odin Sphere Leifthrasir UPC: 730865020010 Odin Sphere Leifthrasir (Sony PlayStation 4, 2016) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information Atlus’ critically acclaimed 2007 action RPG title returns with upgraded graphics, expanded worlds, and fully voiced story scenes in Odin Sphere Leifthrasir. The game offers includes with hand-drawn, manga-inspired HD artwork and five playable characters. A powerful artifact called the “cauldron” has maintained order throughout the kingdom of Valentine for years. Now the peace has been shattered with the sudden disruption of the cauldron’s powers. War has broken out among the neighboring realms with fairies and warriors alike trying to seize the cauldron in the hopes of rekindling its magic and gaining control of the rival nations. In order to save the world from erupting into chaos, players will guide a warrior princess named Gwendolyn and her friends on a quest to save the land from a dark fate foretold by an ancient prophecy. Detailed item info

Product Information
Atlus’ critically acclaimed 2007 action RPG title returns with upgraded graphics, expanded worlds, and fully voiced story scenes in Odin Sphere Leifthrasir. The game offers includes with hand-drawn, manga-inspired HD artwork and five playable characters. A powerful artifact called the “cauldron” has maintained order throughout the kingdom of Valentine for years. Now the peace has been shattered with the sudden disruption of the cauldron’s powers.

War has broken out among the neighboring realms with fairies and warriors alike trying to seize the cauldron in the hopes of rekindling its magic and gaining control of the rival nations. In order to save the world from erupting into chaos, players will guide a warrior princess named Gwendolyn and her friends on a quest to save the land from a dark fate foretold by an ancient prophecy.

item.title: Bladestorm: Nightmare – PlayStation 4
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:29.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “GAME DISK ONLY! Every game we sell is GUARANTEED TO WORK! May have markings, discoloration, scratches, or other cosmetic flaws. This does not affect gameplay.” Platform: Sony PlayStation 4 Rating: T – Teen Release Year: 2015 Genre: Action/Adventure MPN: 040198002646 Game Name: Bladestorm: Nightmare UPC: 040198002646 Bladestorm: Nightmare (Sony PlayStation 4, 2015) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information Gamers serve as a mercenary and control squads of soldiers as they battle through a fictionalized version of the Hundred Years’ War in Bladestorm: Nightmare. Players can freely switch between the French and British sides of the conflict, controlling a variety of different troop types, and interacting with heroes like Joan of Arc and Edward the Black Prince along the way. A tavern serves as the base of operations where gamers can hire special soldiers and purchase new equipment, and once they head into battle they can command as many as four different squads simultaneously. Essentially an upgraded remake of Bladestorm: The Hundred Years’ War, Nightmare includes graphical enhancements, a revised character editor, online multiplayer action, and an entirely new mode that lends the title its name. The new Nightmare mode finds the British and French ceasing their hostilities and joining forces to battle hordes of hideous monsters like dragons, griffons, and cyclops. Online multiplayer includes two-player co-op in Story mode, or versus action in which two gamers compete to capture bases, capture guardians, defeat commanders, or kill monsters. Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Game Bladestorm: Nightmare MPN 040198002646 UPC 040198002646 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 4 ESRB Rating T – Teen Genre Action, Adventure Location USA Tech Details ESRB Descriptor Alcohol Reference, Mild Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Violence Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1-2 Release Year 2015 Game Special Features Become a mercenary and lead squads of soldiers in intense combat between the French and British Battle hordes of mythical monsters in the new Nightmare mode Join a friend for online co-op and versus multiplayer action View on eBay

The post Bladestorm: Nightmare – PlayStation 4 appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.

Bladestorm: Nightmare (Sony PlayStation 4, 2015) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

Product Information
Gamers serve as a mercenary and control squads of soldiers as they battle through a fictionalized version of the Hundred Years’ War in Bladestorm: Nightmare. Players can freely switch between the French and British sides of the conflict, controlling a variety of different troop types, and interacting with heroes like Joan of Arc and Edward the Black Prince along the way. A tavern serves as the base of operations where gamers can hire special soldiers and purchase new equipment, and once they head into battle they can command as many as four different squads simultaneously.

Essentially an upgraded remake of Bladestorm: The Hundred Years’ War, Nightmare includes graphical enhancements, a revised character editor, online multiplayer action, and an entirely new mode that lends the title its name. The new Nightmare mode finds the British and French ceasing their hostilities and joining forces to battle hordes of hideous monsters like dragons, griffons, and cyclops. Online multiplayer includes two-player co-op in Story mode, or versus action in which two gamers compete to capture bases, capture guardians, defeat commanders, or kill monsters.
